item.description:
Join me this Saturday at 10:30 AM on a trip from Barrington on the East Bay Bikepath.

We've biked from the Bristol side, we've biked from the Providence side, but we've NEVER biked from Barington in the middle. The entire path is roughly 26 miles round trip, but since we're starting from the middle, riders can simply do half the ride for a total of around 13 miles.

We'll meet ON THE BIKE PATH in front of Shaws, right next to the brown wooden signboards.

I'm going to be wearing my stylish bike helmet, and I suggest (but do not require) that you do the same.

There are a few (non-alcoholic) beverage and ice cream vendors on the way, so feel free to bring a few dollars for refreshments.
item.how_to_find_us: I have a red car and a red bike, also I have a cell: 401-699-7304
item.name: Biking the East Bay (BARRINGTON start point) 13 OR 26 miles
